name: Coin Of The Realm
description:
“Coin Of The Realm” is a light drawing created on a 1980’s Vectrex game console with an A-100 analog modular synthesizer. The title is in reference to the advent of street finance and the dawn of decentralization.

The pulsating image is fundamentally volatile, expanding and collapsing in ritual boom and bust cycles. Eventually it dissolves into an incomprehensible jumble of wavelengths and light ribbons representing the total convergence of art, economics and human thought.

“Coin Of The Realm” is the first in the Physical Math series of 4k NFTs, all of which connect to the ancestral memory of primal fire and everything that first blinking light unleashed.
